---
title: "ChannelId"
---
<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/website.rs -->

A 16-bit ID representing an MCAP channel.

Used to identify specific channels within an MCAP file.


## Arrow datatype
```
uint16
```
